verses.verse: An <S%H4853>oracle.<s%> The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is against the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2317>Hadrach,<s%> and will <S%H4496>rest<s%> upon <S%H1834>Damascus;<s%> for the <S%H5869>eye<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> and of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is toward <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>
and <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> <S%H1379>also,<s%> which borders on <S%H6865>it;<s%> Tyre and <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> because they are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2449>wise.<s%>

<S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> herself a <S%H4692>stronghold,<s%> and heaped <S%H6651>up<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> like the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and fine <S%H2742>gold<s%> like the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

<S%H136>Behold,<s%> the Lord will <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> <S%H5221>her,<s%> and he will strike her <S%H2428>power<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and she will be <S%H398>devoured<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3372>it,<s%> and fear; <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> <S%H3966>also,<s%> and will writhe in <S%H2342>agony;<s%> as will <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> for her <S%H4007>expectation<s%> will be <S%H3001>disappointed;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H6>perish<s%> from <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> will not be <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>
<S%H4464>Foreigners<s%> will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and his <S%H8251>abominations<s%> from between his <S%H8127>teeth;<s%> and he also will be a <S%H7604>remnant<s%> for our <S%H430>God;<s%> and he will be as a <S%H441>chieftain<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> as a <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

I will <S%H2583>encamp<s%> around my <S%H1004>house<s%> against the <S%H4675>army,<s%> that none pass <S%H5674>through<s%> or <S%H7725>return;<s%> and no <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> will pass <S%H5674>through<s%> them any <S%H7200>more:<s%> for now I have seen with my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H1523>Rejoice<s%> <S%H3966>greatly,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion!<s%> <S%H7321>Shout,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem!<s%> <S%H4428>Behold,<s%> your King <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H6662>you!<s%> He is righteous, and having <S%H3467>salvation;<s%> <S%H6041>lowly,<s%> and <S%H7392>riding<s%> on a <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> even on a <S%H5895>colt,<s%> the <S%H1121>foal<s%> of a <S%H860>donkey.<s%>

I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> from <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H5483>horse<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%> will be cut <S%H3772>off;<s%> and he will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> and his <S%H4915>dominion<s%> will be from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and from the <S%H5104>River<s%> to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
As for you <S%H1818>also,<s%> because of the blood of your <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> I have set <S%H7971>free<s%> your <S%H615>prisoners<s%> from the <S%H953>pit<s%> in which is no <S%H4325>water.<s%>

<S%H7725>Turn<s%> to the <S%H1225>stronghold,<s%> you <S%H615>prisoners<s%> of <S%H8615>hope!<s%> Even <S%H3117>today<s%> I <S%H5046>declare<s%> that I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> double to <S%H4932>you.<s%>

For indeed I bend <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as a <S%H7198>bow<s%> for <S%H4390>me.<s%> I have filled the <S%H7198>bow<s%> with <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and I will stir <S%H5782>up<s%> your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> against your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H3120>Greece,<s%> and will <S%H7760>make<s%> you like the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of a mighty <S%H1368>man.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be <S%H7200>seen<s%> over <S%H2671>them;<s%> and his arrow will go <S%H3318>flash<s%> like <S%H1300>lightning;<s%> and the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and will <S%H1980>go<s%> with <S%H5591>whirlwinds<s%> of the <S%H8486>south.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> will <S%H1598>defend<s%> <S%H398>them;<s%> and they will destroy and <S%H3533>overcome<s%> with <S%H7050>sling<s%> <S%H68>stones;<s%> and they will <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H1993>roar<s%> as through <S%H3196>wine;<s%> and they will be <S%H4390>filled<s%> like <S%H4219>bowls,<s%> like the <S%H2106>corners<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> them in that <S%H3117>day<s%> as the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of his <S%H5971>people;<s%> for they are like the <S%H68>jewels<s%> of a <S%H5145>crown,<s%> lifted on <S%H5264>high<s%> over his <S%H127>land.<s%>

For how great is his <S%H2898>goodness,<s%> and how great is his <S%H3308>beauty!<s%> <S%H1715>Grain<s%> will make the young <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H5107>flourish,<s%> and new <S%H8492>wine<s%> the <S%H1330>virgins.<s%>
